videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: Temur stompy has a new Queen.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a Temur stompy deck, ft. Eshki, Temur's Roar as commander in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

40:38 - vs Sab-Sunen, Luxa Embodied
